collectionMetadata.name: Collective Agreements Certified by Type of Workers Covered
collectionMetadata.description:
Categories of employees covered by Collective Agreements Certified.

Agreements are those between employers and employees on employment, non-employment, terms of employment, or conditions of work. The duration of a collective agreement is specified and by law shall not be less than two years or more than three years.

datasetMetadata.name: Total Collective Agreements Certified by Type of Workers Covered
datasetMetadata.description: Categories of employees covered by collective agreements certified

datasetMetadata.name: Collective Agreements Certified by Type of Workers Covered
datasetMetadata.description:
Categories of employees covered by collective agreements certified.
In 2013, there was a re-categorisation of categories for the type of workers covered. 'Professionals, Managers, Executives & Technicians' was broken down to 2 new categories- 'Professionals, Managers & Executives' and 'Associate Professionals & Technicians'. 'Production & Transport Operators, Cleaners & Labourers' was replaced by a new category 'Production, Transport & Manual Workers'. In addition, a new category, 'Maritime Officers & Seaman' was created and tracked from 2013.
